name: Paris
description: Discover the city of lights with our expert guides. Visit the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and enjoy a cruise on the Seine.

name: Tokyo
description: Experience the blend of traditional culture and futuristic technology in Japan's vibrant capital.

name: Rome
description: Walk through millennia of history in the Eternal City, from the Colosseum to Vatican City.

name: New York
description: Explore the Big Apple's iconic landmarks, diverse neighborhoods, and vibrant cultural scene.

name: Barcelona
description: Admire Gaudi's architectural masterpieces and enjoy the Mediterranean lifestyle in this Catalan gem.

name: Sydney
description: Discover the harbor city's iconic Opera House, beautiful beaches, and vibrant culture.
